name: Sheepify
description: Turns any being into a measly sheep, even you.

name: Crybaby Dominion
description: Turns any being into a crybaby, yet powerful, ghost from the nether.

name: Creeper... Aw Man
description: Turns any being into a creeper

name: Malin Kundang
description: Turns any anak durhaka into obsidian

name: Drowning
description: Villagers can't swim. Turns any being into a drowned.
